policy

Class PolicyMRU<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • policy.PolicyMRU<K>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Policy<K>

    public class PolicyMRU<K>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Policy<K>
    This MRU Policy maintains a list of keys. Each key represents the most recently used item for each set of the cache.

        public void setCacheSize(int blocksPerSet,
                         int numberOfSets)

        Specified by:
